member.name: IHWEventHandler2.HandleEventWithHWND
member.summary: Handles AutoPlay device events that contain content types that the application is not registered to handle. This method provides a handle to the owner window so that UI can be displayed if the process requires elevated privileges.
member.param: A pointer to a string buffer that contains the device ID.
A pointer to a string buffer that contains the alternate device ID. The alternate device ID is more human-readable than the primary device ID.
A pointer to a string buffer that contains the event type. The event types include DeviceArrival, DeviceRemoval, MediaArrival, and MediaRemoval.
A handle to the AutoPlay dialog that was displayed.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IHWEventHandler2
member.summary: Extends the interface to address User Account Control (UAC) elevation for device handlers.
